instruction: Provide a summary of the argument made in the given prompt
input: Most parents today struggle to set boundaries and rules that are both firm and respectful of their child’s autonomy. Both over-permissiveness and authoritarian parenting styles have proven ineffective.
output: Parents today have the difficult challenge of establishing boundaries with their children while still respecting their autonomy. Both extreme parenting styles of over-permissiveness and authoritarianism have been proven ineffective and so parents must strike a balance between the two.
